Changes
=======

0.2.2
-----

2010-10-13
~~~~~~~~~~

* Updated the pipe to use HTTPKit 0.2.0
* Removed the need for a nested AttributeDict

0.2.1
-----

2010-09-03
~~~~~~~~~~

* Upgraded to use PipeStack

0.1.1
-----

2009-12-24
~~~~~~~~~~

* BuildKit support
* Fixed a Python 2.6 depreciation warning

0.1.0
-----

2009-11-11
~~~~~~~~~~

* Added a service
* First version
